author: sky.cactus
content: I pretty strongly against this change.  I fear that it is going to lead to more bugs than it fixes, and the bugs it causes will be more subtle and harder to debug.

author: sky.cactus
content: I understand that some tooling expects the field to be present, but if the field is missing entirely then the tool fails hard and fast and fixing it should be pretty simple.  If the field is present but *wrong*, then the tools will fail in bizarre ways.  Also, if we continue to provide this field people will continue to use it rather than using the more correct receipt.

author: sky.cactus
content: If we are going to include it, we should have a very clear EOL policy for it and document that in the description.  For example, "this field will be removed from clients sometime after 2022-01-01".
